product_name: The North Face Denali Thermal Scarf - Women's
long_description: You'll forget the windchill when wrapped in this velvety soft Denali scarf from The North Face. Breathable, quick-drying and non-pilling polyester fleece offers warmth without a lot of weight, so you stay comfortable. Machine washable. Dimensions: 7.5 x 59 in.
short_description: You'll forget the windchill when wrapped in this velvety soft Denali scarf from The North Face.
